DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tumor tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study gene expression profile cervical cancer progression biopsy tissue sample patient cervical lesion .
DOC.brief_title: Gene Expression Profiling Cervical Cancer Progression Biopsies Tissue Samples
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Classify cervical cancer progression molecular level use gene expression profile generate expression microarrays . - Profile gene expression change dysplasia early carcinoma uterine cervical tissue molecular level use expression microarrays . - Define set gene classify various grade cervical cancer/dysplasia molecular level . - Compare expression profile clinical data determine accurately cell line model vivo environment . OUTLINE : Patients undergo colposcopy cervical smear take flow cytometry analysis . Patients also undergo 2 biopsy one clinically abnormal normal site . Tissue sample analyze gene expression profile use human expression microarrays contain approximately 40,000 unique sequence . Data analysis consist define set gene , contain new target biomarkers , classify biopsy 3 grade .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Clinically suspicious malignant premalignant cervical lesion Criteria Inclusion criterion : Included subject â‰¥18 year old . Included subject pregnant . Included subject negative urine pregnancy test . Included subject schedule colposcopy and/or LEEP treatment VGH Women 's Clinic . Included subject indicate understanding study . Included subject provide inform consent participate . Exclusion criterion : Individuals < 18 year old exclude . Pregnant individual exclude . Individuals operation remove cervix exclude .
